name: The Peacock Project
description: Peacock is a Hitman server emulator. Instructions on how to install Peacock linked. Perks: obtain all unlocks immediately, get rating screen without being connected to IOI servers.

name: Ansel Freecam
description: Routing tool for PC users with Nvidia graphics card.

name: Grun IGT Adder
description: Handy speedrun timer, easy to use and highly customizable. Please use this tool to add up IGT for full game runs.

name: HITMAN 3 Unlocks and Mastery Guide (Hitman Wiki)
description: List of unlocks/ mastery tracks of Hitman 3. Easier to search but no 7 deadly sin or Deluxe edition unlocks listed.

name: HITMAN 3 Unlocks and Mastery Guide (Hitmanforum)
description: More extensive list of unlocks for Hitman 3 (but harder to search)

name: HITMAPS
description: Interactive maps containing info on every item location, navigation feature, etc. Useful tool for routing.

name: Legendary (Epic Launcher Alternative) for PC Players
description: Legendary is a less performance intensive alternative to Epic Games Launcher

name: Score to Time Calculator
description: Calculator tool to convert score to time for individual level runs. Note that this will not work for any% runs with a score of 0. This tool is meant for personal interest purposes only (to see decimal values of IGT), it will not be used for leaderboard ranking.

name: Hitman 3 Speedrun.com
description: Original Hitman 3 Speedrun.com leaderboards (which this site mirrors). Go to speedrun.com if you want to submit runs.

name: GitHub
description: This website is open-source meaning that if you find an issue or want to add something then you can put in an issue or pull request.

name: Discord
description: F7SC Discord: The most active Discord for Hitman speedrunning.
